House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04778
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING REFORMS IN LAND ADMINISTRATION
ABSTRACT : Intends to consolidate and streamline within a single government agency, land administration powers and functions (land surveys, mapping, classification, titling and disposition and registration) currently dispersed among the DOJ's Land Registration Authority and Registries of Deeds; and the DENR's Lands Management Bureau, Land Management Services in the regional, provincial and community offices, NAMRIA, and CARP Secretariat and its field offices.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESCUDERO, EVELINA G.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-23
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
